>Bring the photocopy of main or temporary certificate of S.S.C/Equivalent.

>Original registration card of H.S.C/Equivalent and attested photocopy of it(2 copy) write roll(Bengali and English) in photocopy. 

>Attested color photo of examinee(2 copy) and write name and roll(from SMS) in backside of photo both Bengali and English. 

>Attach photos upper left corner of registration card separately by stapler. 

>Nobody can not participate in admission test without original registration card of H.S.C/Equivalent. 

>Mobile phone, Calculator or any other electrical communication device strictly prohibited in examination hall. 

>Use ballpoint pen to fill up answer script. 

>If anyone lose his roll number, he can collect roll number from corresponding unit office by paying 200/-.
